resources.string: These are the terms of Service and privacy policy of this app. This app provides you screen casting functionality. This privacy policy provices an overview of how we process personal data of our users. We will not share any of your personal information with anyone except as per stated in this privacy policy.

We respect your rights and your privacy. Your ability to make informed choices about the use of your information is important to us. We collect different types of information for various purposes to provide you with more improved services.
Permissions in this Application are the Following
• Write External Storage • Read External Storage

We may change this privacy policy from time to time, by posting the most current privacy policy and its effective date. In case we change this privacy policy substantially, we may bring such changes to your attention by explicit notice in this page.
We do not include or offer third-party products or services on our website.

Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 (Children). We do not knowingly collect any personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent/guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
Are you sure to exit the app?
This app requires permission to use location services to search nearby devices for Screen Casting
Share this incredible app with your friends and family.
Sorry, this device is not supported.
Make sure to connect your phone and TV to same network to start screen casting.
By clicking Cast button you would get a list of Nearby devices available for casting
Select your device from list, start screen casting and enjoy on big screen.
Storage permission is required to access media files on your device.
You must to allow Storage Permission to access your Media Files for Screen Casting.
This Language will be available in future updates.
